game.title: The Lost Temple Treasure
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient temple treasure and return it to me.
game.description: The temple has been sealed for centuries, but a recent earthquake has opened a hidden path. Be careful, as traps and puzzles guard the treasure.

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the temple.
task.description: Search the surrounding area for a hidden entrance. It may be guarded by a fierce creature or protected by a magical ward.
task.location: The ancient forest, near the river

task.description: A series of pressure plates must be stepped on in a specific order to unlock the next chamber. Observe carefully and use your problem-solving skills.
task.location: The first chamber of the temple

task.description: A powerful creature guards the treasure. Use all your abilities and resources to defeat it in combat.
task.location: The treasure chamber of the temple
